data.title: Used to be good
data.text: This place was great when it first opened...The business has slowed down, and now there is less staff.  Three times, I had to beg someone to take our money. Everyone kept syaing, "I cant ring that up", your waitress has to.  Where is She??

data.title: Don't go here if you are in a hurry.
data.text: Food is average and service/kitchen is real slow.  They try hard but never seem to have enough help to get it done efficiently and sometimes the food quality is lacking.

data.title: BREAKFAST ALL DAY
data.text: Came here today July 15 with several members of our family because some of our younger grandchildren wanted pancakes.  Now if you are looking to have breakfast then this the place.  If looking for most non breakfast items then you should look elsewhere.  Several of us opted to order from the breakfast menu which is extensive.  I had 2 eggs, 2 sausage links, 1 slice of toast and some hash browns from the 55+ menu offerings.  It was good but nothing to rave about.

data.title: DO NOT GO
data.text: I wish I could give it zero stars. DO NOT go to this location. I visited it today and walked out after sitting at the table for 15 minutes waiting for someone to come by and take our order. The place was dead so its not like they had thousands of tables to take care of. Besides us, there were two other couples inside. They too were sitting there without any food or drinks. I will NEVER go there again. Take your money somewhere else where you are more appreciated.

data.title: Good food- poor service
data.text: I went there from 4:30- 5:30am on a Monday. There were 2 people there & the service was horrible. The food was served hot, however.

data.title: Great place for pancakes or breakfast in general
data.text: This restaurant is conveniently located.  It serves formula iHop food in a clean environment.  If you are in the mood for pancakes this is the place to go.

data.title: There's a reason pancakes is in its name
data.text:
Friendly service, nostalgic 50s music , excellent pancakes. 
Skip the omelette which contains pancake batter which detracted not added to the flavor. The one slice of cheese on top didn't make it less dry.
I miss the hearty buckwheat pancakes which have been replaced by an extensive selection of sweet varieties appealing to American dessert tastes.
The  buttermilk pancakes were as good as ever. The teapot was finally large enough and service with a smile was offered.
Prices reasonable and bathroom clean.
Good stop for travelers or coffee and tea dwaddlers.

data.title: Friendly employees
data.text: We had breakfast - the food was good but did not look like the picture on the menu.  Both the hostess and waitress were extremely friendly and always smiling.  We would definitely eat here again, but can't say that it was an outstanding experience.  The food runner never smiled and seemed like maybe she didn't like her job, the wait for our food was a little longer than we would have expected, especially because the restaurant was not very busy.  As this is a fairly new restaurant (I believe less than a year old) we were disappointed to see ripped seats.

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: Haven't eaten at IHOP is awhile and wanted something quick and the Quick 2 eggs, hash browns, bacon and toast was perfect.  Service was quick and I was in and out in 25 minutes.

data.title: Always a good, fast...
data.text: Always a good, fast anytime breakfast meal. At lunchtime I enjoyed the 2+2+2, coffee and orange juice. My wife and sister split the Rooty Tooty Fresh & Fruity pancakes and coffee. This is a clean, well maintained restaurant with pleasant waitstaff. The food and coffee is always fresh and well prepared.

data.title: Tasty breakfast
data.text: The scrambled eggs were moist, hash browns were just eight and crepes were sweet.  I'd come back to this place again when I'm in the area.  Friendly staff.

data.title: I always come back
data.text:
I gave this IHOP or any I IHOP a 4 because I don't particularly like their coffee. It's a little strong for my taste. Every restaurant I review I always rate the coffee.

So that being said, this particular IHOP is a 5 for service, cleanliness, and quality of food.

Late this afternoon I ate alone and along with my coffee I had the fit and simple egg dish for 360 calories I believe. It was awesome. I also had a side order of their red skin mashed potatoes with onions because I love them so much, and budgeted with my daily allotment of calories.

 Incidentally., if you are counting calories and use My Fitness Pal app, all of the IHOP menu items are on there with the nutrition value. That makes it so much easier than trying to figure out every item attendee selection.

I was surprised and it wasn't more crowded as I left around 6:15 and there are only about 20 people in there on a Saturday night

data.title: I'm full
data.text:
Belle says "the food is good but the portions are too big!"
Ben says "lots of flavor on the pancakes and good bacon"
Mom says "eggs were eggcellent"
Dad says "always plenty of good choices and friendly staff"

data.title: Easy, quick meal...
data.text: Hot pot of coffee at your table, well prepared meals and good service at a fair price. I have not had anything but breakfast foods at IHOP so I can't write about the rest of the menu.

data.title: Far superior to Denny's and Steak and Shake
data.text: A friend and I have a habit of driving around Saturday evenings not doing anything in particular, so we often end up trying to find places to eat late at night. We ended up at this IHOP between midnight and one am after somebody at our usual late-night eatery tipped us off about it. Based on our visit, I would say this IHOP is the absolute best in the 24 hour crowd. The food was good, typical IHOP quality, and our waitress, Porsha, was excellent. If you're looking for somewhere to go when everything is closed, look no further.

data.title: For breakfast lovers!
data.text:
You know you're not going there for haute cuisine, so just relax and enjoy it! Lots of good quality breakfast food, so go there when you're taking a day off your diet. We love the Big Steak Omelette. Steak, eggs, hash browns? All mixed together? How can any breakfast lover not want to try this? We get ours with Harvest Grain ’N Nut® Pancakes. This time, we tried all four of the flavored syrups at the table. 
     This place can be very busy at peak times, but the service has always been friendly and efficient. Prices are good too, considering how much food you get.

data.title: Love having breakfast for dinner.
data.text: We went out as a family to ihop because we all love eating out for breakfast. We had always driven by, but finally decided to stop. The food was really good. Hash browns weren't too greasy, pancakes were delish. There was really no wait, plenty of staff, and they were very polite & attentive.

data.title: Great service
data.text: Food was good I had chorizo omelette spicy but not too.  Wife had vegetarian omelette. And enjoyed it. My daughter had a very good pot roast dinner. What made the meal special was the. Service we got from our waitress nickname iffy was above and beyond what we expected

data.title: Typical IHOP restaurant. Good not great.
data.text: While visiting our Son and his family in Michigan we stopped in at the IHOP restaurant in Novi for brunch. I'm not an IHOP regular as there isn't one close to where we live. The decor and ambiance is what you expect for this type of restaurant. Nothing to brag about. But your there for a great breakfast right? Well it was ok at best. Our group had quite a variety from eggs and sausage to crepes. The service was the fair as the waitress messed up ordering one of our meals. She explained she must had picked up the wrong plate in the kitchen. My crepes were just ok as well. The price was higher than I expected for a breakfast and not nearly as good as We get from our local breakfast places back in the Kansas City area. There was no one at the cash register to pay so we had to wait on a server to finish at a table before she came and collected on money.  I think I'll hop on past IHOP next time.

data.title: Small portions - SLOW service
data.text: The portion sizes are small.  And you will constantly have top find someone to bring you an extra cup of coffee.
